sourcesContent:
<template>
    <form @submit.prevent="submitForm">
    <label for="name">Name</label>
    <input id="name" type="text" v-model="product.name" placeholder="Name" required>

    <label for="description">Description</label>
    <textarea id="description" v-model="product.description" placeholder="Description" required></textarea>

    <label for="price">Price</label>
    <input id="price" type="number" step="0.01" v-model="product.price" placeholder="Price" required>

    <label for="image">Image</label>
    <input id="image" type="file" accept="image/*" @change="handleFileUpload" required>

    <label for="categories">Categories</label>
    <select id="categories" v-model="product.categories" multiple required>
      <option >KK</option>
    </select>

    <button type="submit">Submit</button>
  </form>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
  }
  </script>
  
  <style>
  form {
    max-width: 420px;
    margin: 30px auto;
    background: rgb(15, 165, 137);
    text-align: left;
    padding: 40px;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
  label {
    color: rgb(11, 12, 12);
    display: block;
    margin: 25px 0 15px;
    font-size: 1em;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    font-weight: bold;
  }
  input {
    display: block;
    padding: 10px 6px;
    width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: none;
    border-bottom: 2px solid gainsboro;
    color: #555;
  }
  </style>
